features: The Best Face Moisturizer Cream For Stronger, Healthier Looking Skin. Feed your skin the vitamins, minerals and amino acids it needs for optimum well being with our robust 12 in 1 plant based formula. Get healthier, stronger, happier looking skin with instant and long term rejuvenation.

Superfood For Your Skin. Extra robust facial cream with organic Aloe Vera, Manuka Honey, MSM, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Blue Green Algae, Olive Oils and Cocoa Butter with vitamins A, B, C, E. Some of the most nutrient rich plant based face moisturizer on the market today.

Deep Hydration. Our non greasy face cream will moisturize to the base of your skin, not just coat the surface, which lasts for hours. Advanced formula fully absorbs and leaves no residue to be the best face cream for dry skin. A little goes a long way to instantly calm dry, damaged skin.
Repair And Protect. The perfect anti aging face cream and night cream with ingredients shown to help damaged cells, nourish aging skin, soothe irritation and give firmer, softer looking skin.

As Safe As It Is Effective. Premium face moisturizer cream for women and men made for sensitive skin. Non oily and safe for your pores, perfect to use on face, hands, body and feet. No toxins, fragrances, fillers, or parabens. Since Complete works with your skin’s natural biology, it’s the best face cream for all skin types whether dry, oily, combination or damaged skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Complete Moisturizer What do you get when you combine the most potent Aloe Vera on earth with the healing powers of Manuka Honey Cream, MSM, Blue-Green Algae, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter, Cehami Extract, Shea Butter and Olive Oil? A Complete skin care solution for any skin type and nearly any skin condition across your whole body.

Our Ingredients Are Proven To Help: Moisturize And Nourish To The Base Of Your SkinRepair And RejuvenateSoften The Look of Tough SkinImprove ComplexionReduce Irritation And RednessBoosts Healing, Stimulate New Cell GrowthStrengthen FibersPlump To Reduce The Appearance of WrinklesMakes Skin Look More Toned and Supple
Our Plant Base Formula Can Help Give Better, More Beautiful Looking Skin Oily, Acne Prone SkinFine Lines And WrinklesDry/Cracked SkinIrritated skinAging skinSensitive Skin

Aloe Vera Naturally includes vitamins A, C, B and E and is loaded with minerals such as Zinc, Calcium, Magnesium and Copper, plus enzymes essential to all living organisms. Enjoy deep hydration, calming irritated skin and increased recovery for softer looking skin. Manuka Honey Straight from New Zealand, Manuka Honey is quickly becoming a staple to well-being products thanks to its unique blend of vitamins, minerals, and amino acids. Manuka honey helps hydrate, nourish, soothe and protect your skin. Coconut Oil Coconut oil’s highly penetrating properties make it excellent for moisturizing and replenishing. Daily use helps delay the appearance of old age by supporting the skin and reducing the appearance of fine lines. Super effective against a wide array of skin conditions. MSM MSM is often called the “Beauty Mineral” thanks to its ability to help: boost collagen and keratin for powerful looking skin, promoting skin regeneration, softening dry/cracked skin, deeply moisturizing and reduces irritation. MSM is also used to helps reduce pigment conditions such as melasma, age spots, sun damage, etc.

Shea Butter Shea butter has been used in Africa for hundreds of years to help protect skin from the harsh conditions and heal a variety of skin conditions, minor cuts and burns. Shea butter is shown to help prevent skin aging, moisturize deeply, protect from UV damage, soothe irritation, and stimulates collagen production to help make the skin look stronger, more supple and younger. Blue Green Algae Our high-grade Blue Green Algae contains almost every organic mineral in trace amounts which is what the skin needs to heal and replenish. Also high in proteins and fatty acids which help strengthen your skin to lift and tone appearance, while supporting elasticity and firmness. It’s superfood for your skin! Olive Oil Safe and gentle for even the most sensitive skins, olive oil helps: moisturize, supports a more youthful, supple look, speed up recovery, reduce irritation, smooths out skin and help prevent free radical damage. Cehami Extract Cehami is an Australian flower used by the Aboriginal people for centuries for its anti-irritation and cellular regeneration properties.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dry, sensitive, acne prone skin you need this!
reviews.reviewText: First off I read the reviews which convinced me to try this product. Secondly, I almost never pay this amount for a moisturizer. Not because the good stuff isn't worth it but mostly because I don't have extra money to spend on something that MAY work on my dry, sensitive, acne prone skin. I previously used raw shea butter as it was the only thing that got rid of my dry patches, actually penetrated my skin and didn't make my acne worse. It didn't make my condition better though. 2 weeks in (and I will update later) and I have to say overall my acne as decreased to the point my face is almost clear. I usually don't have acne all over but usually along my jaw line and more on the cheeks during TOTM. My complexion has certainly even out getting rid of the ruddiness and patchy dried out look. I am impressed with the ingredients as I know for my skin honey and aloe work wonders, shea butter has always been kind but combined together has been great. I can't use aloe alone its no where near moisturizing enough but it heals amazingly and I can't wear honey everywhere either. I was concerned about coconut oil cause I know it can be comedogenic and alone it always sat on my skin never sinking in. There have been no breakouts from this at all if that is a concern. Ok sorry for the tangent but I wanted to be thorough. First impression it had a slight burning sensation the first time I used it. I chalked it up to my skin is sensitive and was slightly inflamed at the time. Second application there was no burning. This stuff sank in very quickly to the point it felt like my skin was naturally soft and I didn't have moisturizer on. I ended up using a little more around my nose and other dry patches I had. It is still winter after all. They went away after that. After 2 weeks my skin is more balanced that I don't need more after my initial application. I'm not used to this quite yet as I got used to having a greasy feeling until everything sank in because my skin was so parched. This just feels like healthy moist skin. I don't need cover up now and refuse to put on foundation because I want my skin to breathe and it's been wonderful. I think this is definitely a purchase worth fitting into your budget. I have tried so many natural, organic very costly face moisturizers over the years and have spent so much time trying to create my own homemade stuff but I couldn't make something as wonderful as this. If this stuff continues to work and I don't have any reactions later on which I usually would have by now then my search for a perfect moisturizer is over. I would like to add I use this in conjunction with African Black Soap purchased on Amazon from seller smellgood and its a very thick paste not bar form. I need help with acne scarring and it has definitely helped clear up remaining acne and prevented breakouts. I also add a drop of Cosmedica Hyaluronic Acid (sold on Amazon also with great reviews) to the moisturizer for extra moisture and help with fine lines as I'm 30 and already have them. If you found this review helpful, albeit long winded please hit the button so as many people as possible can read it and make an informed decision. I can't say its a miracle cream like some but I can say it is pretty darn close and I wouldn't write a fake review if you paid me to. Have a great day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Love this and just purchased again as I am nearly out. I use it as a face cream (generously) twice a day and the 2 oz cream lasted just over a month.This cream is very thick and moisturizing, but it absorbs quickly and just leaves the skin soft, not greasy! I have struggled to find a cream that balances my skin. Either they are too moisturizing and I have oily skin and breakouts, or they leave my skin dry. This stuff is magic.I have used other organic brands (Derma e is my other favorite right now) that I love pretty equally, but this is a bit cheaper and such a great product.It is unscented but the cocoa butter gives it the slightest fragrance of cocoa, I love it but if you have an aversion to that smell it could be a problem.This product is one of a couple healthy choices I have made for my skin in the last month, and my breakouts are nearly gone and I have barely had to wear any makeup at all as a result. While this stuff only gets partial credit and there are other great products out there as well, I'm sticking with this as I just love how my skin looks and feels when using it.This stuff isn't going to give you the flawless complexion of a 6 year old (unless you happen to be 6 years old), but any product that promises to erase the years is only selling you a fantasy anyway. What this can give you is healthy, beautiful skin, fine lines and all, and that's all I'm looking for in a cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2017
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased this item twice now and used the entire product.I have a long history of acne, oily skin, and dry skin. Finding a product that does not trigger acne can be quite the daunting task. I gave this product a try due to the many claims made. I was a bit skeptical because many products do not do exactly what they claim. Additionally, I often worry how new products will react with my other medications. At this point I am using tretinoin and clindamycin. The product has not had any sort of negative interaction with these medications in my experience (granted you would need to check with your dermatologist first!)This product has a very smooth feel and sometimes feels cool on the face. It is a little on the thicker side but dries fairly quick. It does not like a shine or make my skin oilier than typical. When my skin is dry )thanks to my prescription topicals,) it has a great soothing affect and brings the skin back to where it needs to be. It has not promoted acne in any way nor blackheads. There is a small smell to the product but it disappears quite fast.The reason for 4 stars instead of 5 stars is due to the price. If I had the choice, I would use this product all the time for a long time to come. However, it is a bit pricier and the container is a little small (4oz). The container does allow you to get every bit of the product out because the cap screws off compared to squeeze or pump bottles. A little does go a long way thankfully but buying this often would add up quick. If I was using it on any part of my body other than my face, this container would get used up even quicker.

Meine Mutter hat seit jahren unter seltsamen, stark juckenden Schuppenflechten auf Ihrer Kopfhaut gelitten und weder haben die diversen Salben, welches Sie von Ihrem Hautarzt verschrieben bekommen hat gewirkt, noch haben unzählige andere Produkte wie Teebaumöl, Olivenöl usw. etwas gebracht.Eigentlich hatte Sie sich schon damit abgefunden mit der Hauterkrankung leben zu müssen, doch da bin ich durch das Internet auf diese Salbe aufmerksam geworden und habe es direkt bestellt.Ehrlich gesagt war ich nicht sehr optimistisch, dass diese Salbe dort erfolg haben wird wo so viele andere Produkte versagt haben, jedoch wurde ich eines besseren belehrt. Sie benutzt diese Salbe nun seit etwa 1,5 Monaten 2-3 mal am Tag und die Hauterkrankung ist fast komplett verschwunden.Das starke jucken verschwand schon innerhalb der ersten 2 Wochen der Therapie und seitdem werden die Schuppenflechte(oder was immer das auch war) immer weniger und die Wunden auf Ihrer Kopfhaut können endlich verheilen, da die Salbe von e-raorganics sowohl das Jucken bekämpft, als auch die Wundheilung enorm unterstützt und beschleunigt. Ich wünschte ich hätte vorher nachher Bilder gemacht, aber leider habe ich wirklich nicht damit gerechnet, dass es so gut wirkt.Ich persöhlich benutze die Salbe auch fürs Gesicht gegen Falten oder bei Schnittverletzungen welches ich mir öfters beim Sport oder beim Rasieren zuziehe und bin einfach nur begeistert von dem Produkt.Wir haben auch die e-raorganics relief ausprobiert, jedoch hat es uns nicht so sehr überzeugen können, da es(für uns) von der Wirksamkeit und der Effektivität nicht mit der e-raorganics complete mithalten kann.
È una ottima base trucco idratante ma non unge.Aiuta la pelle sensibile e calma le irritazioni.La comprerò ancora sicuramente.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 18, 2017
reviews.reviewText: I've actually be really surprised with this product as after you try various and methods you become quite sceptical if anything is going to be able to help you.This cream soothes irritation within minutes.Helps hydrate my dry skin.Which is great and all but other products are good at doing these things also. The difference I've found with this is that it doesn't leave much residue on the surface of your skin. It really does feel like your skin has absorbed it and still leaves it feeling moisturised hours after use. Other products leave my skin feeling oily and don't help my breakouts or aren't long lasting so need to reapply more often as my skin starts to dry and feel irritated again.Very much been impressed with this product after just a few days use. Will post an updated review after I have worked with it a bit longer.So far both thumbs up.

Hauttyp: Seborrhoea sicca (trockene Fetthaut) + öfters rote gereizte Haut. Reagiert sofort mit starkem brennen, wenn ich ein Produkt nicht vertrage.Rezension: Produk riecht super lecker, zieht sofort ein, kein Fettfilm, Super weiches Hautgefühl und das den ganzen Tag lang. Kann die Creme nur empfehlen!

Es una crema 10! Textura muy compacta, por lo que cunde mucho. Deja la piel sedosa, sin grasa y de absorción rápida. Huele genial y en a penas unos días notas el resultado. Siempre tengo problemas con otras cremas, ya que me producen mucha grasa, acne...pero esta crema me va de maravilla, justo cuando comencé a usarla tenía granitos y han desaparedido.
